bwwExcerpt: The play is part 'Snooki Comes to Washington,' part 'Pygmalion.' Without a fabulously clever ditz in the tootsie role, however, this can be just a familiar old vehicle that confronts power ethics with the innocence of a sweet old civics lesson.
